itemDescription: English noble; lady-in-waiting to Anne, Princess Royal

wikipedia_page.main: Leonora Mary Anson, Countess of Lichfield,  (née Grosvenor; born 1 February 1949) is a lady-in-waiting to Anne, Princess Royal. She is the daughter of Robert Grosvenor, 5th Duke of Westminster, and The Hon. Viola Lyttelton. She is the former wife of the late noted society photographer, Patrick Anson, 5th Earl of Lichfield.
